sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"另加的，额外的"之意。
means: additional ：由名词additon派生出的形容词，指在原有基础上添加上去的。
extra ：指不包括本身而额外加上去的部分。
supplementary ：由名词supplement派生而来，指对原有的追加或补究。

sentence.Network_en: She gave him an extra scoop of clotted cream.
sentence.Network_cn: 她多给他加了一勺浓缩奶油。

sentence.Network_en: The President is determined "to go the extra mile for peace".
sentence.Network_cn: 总统决心“为实现和平而加倍努力”。

sentence.Network_en: There's an extra blanket in the bottom drawer of the cupboard.
sentence.Network_cn: 壁橱最下面的抽屉里还有一条多余的毯子。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (as an adjective): probably a shortening of extraordinary, suggested by similar forms in French and German

encyclopedia.content: 益达 益达（Extra） 是1984年箭牌公司在美国推出的第一款无糖口香糖，并在短短五年之内跃居全球无糖口香糖的第一品牌。在中国，箭牌公司是从1996年开始在广东率先推出“益达”无糖口香糖的。现在，“益达”无糖口香糖的销售网络已经覆盖了国内逾300座城市，深受中国消费者的青睐。

entry.def: You use extra to describe an amount, person, or thing that is added to others of the same kind, or that can be added to others of the same kind.

example.ex: Police warned motorists to allow extra time to get to work...
example.tran: 警方告诫驾车者出门上班要留出富余时间。

example.ex: Extra staff have been taken on to cover busy periods...
example.tran: 额外雇用了一些员工来应付繁忙时期。

entry.tran: 费用另计的；额外收费的
entry.def: If something is extra, you have to pay more money for it in addition to what you are already paying for something.

example.ex: For foreign orders postage is extra...
The price of your meal is extra.

entry.def: Extras are additional amounts of money that are added to the price that you have to pay for something.

example.ex: She is disgusted by big hotels adding so many extras to the bill that it nearly doubles...
example.tran: 她非常厌恶大酒店额外收取这么多费用，账单金额都快翻倍了。

entry.def: Extras are things which are not necessary in a situation, activity, or object, but which make it more comfortable, useful, or enjoyable.

example.ex: Optional extras include cooking tuition at a top restaurant...
example.tran: 可选的额外项目包括在顶级餐厅学习厨艺。

example.ex: They are also spending much less on extras like meals in restaurants.
example.tran: 他们花在下馆子等额外消费上的钱也少多了。

entry.tran: （电影中的）临时演员，群众演员
entry.def: The extras in a film are the people who play unimportant parts, for example as members of a crowd.
You can use extra in front of adjectives and adverbs to emphasize the quality that they are describing.

example.ex: I'd have to be extra careful...
What makes a magnificent garden extra special?...
example.tran: 是什么让华丽的花园格外特别？

means.word_mean: 1. a minor actor in crowd scenes
2. an additional edition of a newspaper (usually to report a crisis)
3. something additional of the same kind;

sentences.sentence: "he always carried extras in case of an emergency"

means.word_mean: 2. more than is needed, desired, or required;

sentences.sentence: "found some extra change lying on the dresser"
"yet another book on heraldry might be thought redundant"
"it was supererogatory of her to gloat"
"extra ribs as well as other supernumerary internal parts"
"put on special buses for the big game"

stems_affixes.word_buile: extr出去,外+a→adj.额外的,附加的 n.附加物,额外的东西
extr出去,外+a→adj.额外的,附加的 n.附加物,额外的东西

Sentence.sentence: And she makes a little extra money by sending stories to newspapers in the States.
How did Donna make extra money to support herself
Certainly, there are people over age 75 who have had cancers detected by routine screening, and gained several extra years of life because of treatment.

This means that there could be an extra three billion mouths to feed by the end of the century, a period in which substantial changes are anticipated in the wealth, calorie intake and dietary preferences of people in developing countries across the world.
Maybe we'd better allow an extra month, so we won't have to worry about being late.
Why does the man say extra time should be allowed for the project

means.word_mean: 额外的, 附加的，外加的，追加的；另外的；特别的

sentences.en: The ship was loaded down with extra cargo.
sentences.cn: 船上又额外加装了货物。

sentences.en: At this hotel a hot bath is an extra.
sentences.cn: 在这家旅店, 热水浴另外收费。

means.word_mean: 【电影、电视】(拍摄群众场面时雇来的)临时演员，雇作配角的人

sentences.en: We need a thousand extras for big crowd scene.
sentences.cn: 在拍摄群众大场面时, 我们需要上千名临时演员。

sentences.en: He bought an extra large cake.
sentences.cn: 他买了一块非常大的蛋糕。

jushi.english: British Airways are putting on an extra flight to Rome every day.
jushi.chinese: 英国航空公司现在每天增开一班飞往罗马的客机。

jushi.english: They want to print in some extra information.
jushi.chinese: 他们想要印入一些号外消息。

jushi.english: Two extra people are coming for dinner.Will the food stretch out?
jushi.chinese: 又有两个人要来吃饭,饭菜够吃吗?
